name: The Quantum Games
description:
Overview:

Shoot your enemy and shrink his size! The Quantum Games is FPS, one versus one online game that two players fight each other inside the quantum arena. Both players have a special weapon that shrinks the attacked enemy. Upgrade your gear with the latest tech and be the last man standing!

Goals:

Two-player fights against each other in a best-of-7 match. Each round, the player needs to kill the enemy player to win the round. Each round has 4 minutes timer where a deadly zone shrinks towards the center of the map (just like a battle-royal zone) as time passes. After each round, the player receives a bunch of currency. The player uses the currency for upgrading his gear. Upgrades give players unique bonuses that affect the combat.

Controls:

W: Move forward A: Move left, S: Move down, D: Move right, Space bar: Jump, R: reload, Hold mouse left-click: Charge weapon, shoot Mouse movement: Look around, aim.

Hosting online room:

Log in to Steam Before opening up the game! Join or create rooms in your steam region.
